patterns: can I opt for cash on delivery

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
can I get my order early
responses: Delivering the products to our customers on time is our prime duty, most of our orders reach the customer in maximum 2-3 days depending upon the delivery location

patterns: How much is the shipping cost

responses: We charge $50 for orders below $10,000 but for orders of above $10,000-delivery cost is absolutely free. So happy shopping
